Name: [Affinity] Absolutely Flawless
Desc: Soldier 11 has evoked the Mindscape: <color=#FFAF2C>[Indulgent Blaze]</color>. After launching a Dash Attack or Dodge Counter, your character can <color=#2BAD00>immediately follow up with</color> certain attacks near the end of the Basic Attack combo. Additionally, she gains the <color=#FFAF2C>Refreshing Rations</color> effect (Effective for {CReplaceCardParam:BattleCount_Card1100946,1,2} more battles).
Desc2: Soldier 11 is fully prepared, and in better shape than she's ever been.
